body:
Hello

If i want to send a message I'm getting an error:

joels-imac:~ joel$ php /Users/joel/Downloads/venomous0x-WhatsAPI-256dfca/tests/whatsappcopy2.php -s 4179667527* "Hey here is my text"
[] Logging in as 'Joel' (41079667527*)

tx  <stream:features>
tx    <receipt_acks></receipt_acks>
tx  </stream:features>

tx  <auth xmlns="urn:ietf:params:xml:ns:xmpp-sasl" mechanism="DIGEST-MD5-1"></auth>

rx  <start from="s.whatsapp.net"></start>

rx  <stream:features>
rx    <receipt_acks></receipt_acks>
rx  </stream:features>

rx  <challenge xmlns="urn:ietf:params:xml:ns:xmpp-sasl">bm9uY2U9IjQzMzE1NDY0NjAyOSIscW9wPSJhdXRoIixjaGFyc2V0PXV0Zi04LGFsZ29yaXRobT1tZDUtc2Vzcw==</challenge>

tx  <response xmlns="urn:ietf:params:xml:ns:xmpp-sasl"></response>

rx  <failure xmlns="urn:ietf:params:xml:ns:xmpp-sasl"> 
rx    <not-authorized></not-authorized> 
rx  </failure> 

[] Request last seen 4179667527*: 
[] Send message to 4179667527*: whatsappHey here is my text 

tx  <message to="41796675276@s.whatsapp.net" type="chat" id="1347789287-1">
tx    <x xmlns="jabber:x:event">
tx      <server></server>
tx    </x>
tx    <body>whatsappHey here is my text </body>
tx  </message>


Thanks for your help :)
title: Not authorized
